name: Algebraic independence
summary:
In abstract algebra, a subset 
  
    
      
        S
      
    
    {\displaystyle S}
  
 of a field 
  
    
      
        L
      
    
    {\displaystyle L}
  
 is algebraically independent over a subfield 
  
    
      
        K
      
    
    {\displaystyle K}
  
 if the elements of 
  
    
      
        S
      
    
    {\displaystyle S}
  
 do not satisfy any non-trivial polynomial equation with coefficients in 
  
    
      
        K
      
    
    {\displaystyle K}
  
.
In
